name: Soul Harvest (itch) (Furkan Duran)
description:
Soul Harvest is a Roguelite Deck-Building game.

Kill corrupted monsters and collect their Souls.
Failure is inevitable.
You must die again and again to achieve longer survivals.
But there is no absolute survival.

"We almost won."

- Ulfien

Heroes

Unlock different heroes and find your best playstyle. Heroes gives new Souls to survive better.

Talents

Unlock new Talents to get stronger. Try different synergies and find your best set.

Soul Skills

Kill unique monsters to Harvest their Souls. Unlock new skills and choose your set for your next run.
